jaitools.jiffle.runtime
Class VarTable

java.lang.Object
  jaitools.jiffle.runtime.VarTable

public class VarTable
extends java.lang.Object

A symbol table for user-defined variables and pre-defined, named constants (PI, E, NaN).

Author:
Michael Bedward
